name: B(L)OB (LittleMissHatter)
description:
B(L)OB is an endless runner game created by LittleSquidgeStudios.

Play as B(l)ob, a creature who escaped his cage and is on the run from being recaptured and returned to his cage.

Dodge boulders, run on raised ground and aim for the highest score possible.

Controls: Use the UP Arrow Key to Start and Jump.

LittleSquidgeStudios is a partnership between game developers LittleMissHatter and Squidge500.
